titleStmt.title: A treatise of chirurgical operations after the newest, and most exact method founded on the structure of the parts ... : to which is annex'd A general idea of wounds / written originally by Joseph De la Charier ; and translated into English by R. B.
titleStmt.author: La Charrière, Joseph de, d. 1690.
R. B., fl. ca. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: p. 57, 60, 61, 62 numbered 67, 70, 71, 92 respectively.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
